name: DITA Open Toolkit
tagline: The DITA Open Toolkit is an implementation of the OASIS DITA XML Specification.
body:
# About

The DITA Open Toolkit, or DITA-OT for short, is a set of Java-based, open source tools that provide processing for DITA maps and topic content.

You can download the OT and install it for free on your computer to get started with topic-based writing and publishing.

## Download
Download and install [DITA Open Toolkit 1.8](http://sourceforge.net/projects/dita-ot/files/DITA-OT%20Stable%20Release/DITA%20Open%20Toolkit%201.8/).

## Read the Docs
Everything you need to know about [how to use DITA Open Toolkit](http://dita-ot.sourceforge.net/latest/).

## Get Involved
[Contribute](http://dita-ot.sourceforge.net/get-involved.html) to the community and the project.
